poem:
Title: "Song of the Purple Page"

Purple page unfolds,
Tales of ache echo in chords,
Hoping to retell the untold.
A deft hand strums stories sore,
Can a melody mend or misplace?
Yet, under that earnest roar,
We find humanity's face.
Each stroke of the bow, a stroke of grace,
As old as ink, it fills the space.
The epic song is evermore.
